snippet: A federal appeals court panel has kept the stay on rules restricting the use of the most common abortion medications while a case against them plays out in court.
abstract: Federal appeals court panel keeps the stay on Arizona rules restricting the use of the most common abortion medications while a case against them plays out in court.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court panel has kept the stay on rules restricting the use of the most common abortion medications while a case against them plays out in court.

headline.main: Arizona: Court Panel Maintains Stay on Abortion Rules
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Stay Is Kept on Abortion Rules
